name: NETXP LINUX Web Server Activity Detected
description: Monitors executions of commands related to web server activity, focusing on a specific web server user ID. This rule is essential for detecting activities associated with web server configurations and potential security risks. Detection of specific user ID associations enhances the precision of identifying web server-related activities.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "detect_execve_www" and 
any where event.module: "auditd"
